shared_text:
Innovation Charter School, Walla Walla
August 12 at 9:41 PM ·

📝 Dear Innovation Families,

We are so excited to launch the 2020-21 school year! Our staff has been working hard to create an engaging, meaningful learning experience for students in the safest setting.

Distance learning to launch the year: After stakeholder input and county and state health guidance, ICS will begin the year with a distance-learning model, with opportunities for teachers to plan in-person activities for 5 students or less. As soon as it is deemed safe, we will transition to a hybrid model. We will monitor the latest recommendations and communicate with families regularly.

We miss our students and can’t wait to connect with you all soon!
-
For more information, visit our website: www.innovationcs.org

shared_text:
Summit Olympus
November 14, 2019 at 2:10 PM ·

Say WHAAAT! 42% of the Phoenix Class of 2020 have already been accepted to four-year colleges... and it’s only November. We are so excited for our students. Please share your congrats with our Eastern Washington University bound grads - and SHARE this post and the love! So proud! #PhoenixRising253 #collegebound253
.
If college is your goal, we can help you get there! We’ve opened up registration for next year, so be sure to secure your spot. It’s simple, takes about 2 minutes, and there is no obligation. What are you waiting for?
.
Note: we helped 2019 graduates secure roughly $2.2 MILLION in scholarships and financial aid!
.

cdavis@summitps.org
RSVP for our next Open House Dinner on Thursday, December 5th at 6pm.
.
